bibl.title: The Reader's Voice in a Horoscope from Abydos (Perdrizet and Lefebvre, n. 641).
bibl.note: I. Memnonion 641 = O. NEUGEBAUER and H.B. VAN HOESEN, Greek Horoscopes (Philadelphia, 1959) p. 69, No. 353 (September 21-2, 353 CE). The future ἐξαλείψω is designed to be read aloud by future visitors.
bibl.seg: RUTHERFORD Ian, The Reader's Voice in a Horoscope from Abydos (Perdrizet and Lefebvre, n. 641).

I. Memnonion 641 = O. NEUGEBAUER and H.B. VAN HOESEN, Greek Horoscopes (Philadelphia, 1959) p. 69, No. 353 (September 21-2, 353 CE). The future ἐξαλείψω is designed to be read aloud by future visitors.
